duties_responsibilities.duty: Examine damaged vehicle and efficiently plan repair process.
Work and communicate with others on vehicle repair status.
Perform quality repairs while keeping on-time status in mind.
Make decisions on repair vs. replace considering safety, cost, and cycle time.
Remove upholstery, accessories, electrical and hydraulic window operating equipment, and trim to gain access to vehicle and fenders.
Direct the work of an apprentice in the performance of tasks when needed and explain procedures to assistant.
File, grind, and sand repaired surfaces using power tools and hand tools.
Participate in all required safety meetings.

education_certification.credential: Certification in Body Repair (Bachelor's degree in Automotive Engineering is preferred)
